variables.docs: This resource returns information about masteries that are available in-game.

apiDataVariables.name: ids
apiDataVariables.docs: This endpoints returns an array of mastery ids.

apiElementVariables.name: name
apiElementVariables.docs: The name of the mastery as it appears in-game.

apiElementVariables.name: requirement
apiElementVariables.docs: The written out requirements to unlock the mastery track.

apiElementVariables.name: order
apiElementVariables.docs: The order in which the mastery track appears in a list.

apiElementVariables.name: background
apiElementVariables.docs: The background url for the mastery track.

apiElementVariables.name: region
apiElementVariables.docs: The in-game region in which the mastery track belongs.

apiElementVariables.name: levels
apiElementVariables.docs: An array containing the information of each mastery level.

apiDataVariables.name: description
apiDataVariables.docs: The in game description for the given mastery.

apiDataVariables.name: instruction
apiDataVariables.docs: The in game instructions for the given mastery.

apiDataVariables.name: icon
apiDataVariables.docs: The icon url for the mastery.

apiDataVariables.name: point_cost
apiDataVariables.docs: The amount of mastery points required to unlock the mastery.

apiDataVariables.name: exp_cost
apiDataVariables.docs: The total amount of experience needed to train the given mastery level. This total is non-cumulative between levels.
